name: exp4-push-button
description: This package.json is used to be the default for all of my Johnny-Five experiments

scripts.start: npm run build && t2 run dist/buttons-leds.js --single
scripts.start:basic: npm run build && t2 run dist/button.js
scripts.start:double: npm run build && t2 run dist/buttons-leds.js

author: Matthew Zygowicz
